message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $80 to you, and we're willing to sell it to you for $75. We hope this fair price allows us to do business while ensuring you get a great deal.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $75 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to spend closer to $70.  Let me know if you're willing to come down a bit.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After considering your offer, I believe we can reach an agreement. I am willing to sell the product for $72. This still allows us to maintain a fair profit margin while providing you with a good deal.
